name: The Most Basic Fighting Game (Brackey's Game Jam 6)
name_original: The Most Basic Fighting Game (Brackey's Game Jam 6)
description:
Controls: 

[edit I made this on a Mac and the button for playing game mode 1 should be either the windows button or alt, the game mode 2 is control I'm pretty sure (sorry for the confusion) and Backspace is for the chaotic mode

(HIT BACKSPACE ON START OR GAMEMODE SCREEN FOR A SURPRISE)

(This is a two player game) 

for black guy: WASD and E to fight (he can spam so he's already OP that's why he has no special skill)

For orange guy: Arrow keys and option/alt to fight. Has a special fire with '/' that has a 9 second cool down after first use.

Gamemodes: 

Speed Mode: first player to land a hit wins, fastest rules

Basic Mode: Whichever player's score hits 200 first loses! Land more hits on your opponent!

I don't expect to win but I put forth an effort!

Music By Lizardgal, Phonon and Vayre: https://soundcloud.com/phonon_music/amogus
